p.d: Today you can find tee-shirts "Made in Ethiopia" for less than 10 Swiss francs. Ethiopia is the new Eldorado for clothing manufacturers and supplies the major international brands, notably H&M despite its claim to be beyond reproach in ethical terms. Yet the Ethiopian workers earn a pittance. Guests: Isabelle Ducret, journalist with RTS, director of the documentary "Made in Ethiopia"; Didier PÃ©clard, political analyst, senior lecturer and research director with the Global Studies Institute. Presented by: Dominique Laresche. www.tv5monde.com/objectifmonde
